ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess UPDATED INFO
ygData.msgSnippet: My guess it is a refresh error, since I have seen this kind of behavior with a regualar loot.  The client and server are constantly fighting over what your hit
ygData.messageBody:
My guess it is a refresh error, since I have seen this kind of behavior with
a regualar loot. The client and server are constantly fighting over what
your hit points really are :)

Rokenn
